CustomField.formula: IF(Informal_advice__c = TRUE, "Informal advice:", "") + IF(Formal_warning__c = TRUE, "Formal warning:","") + IF(Additional_unannounced_inspections__c = TRUE, "Additional unannounced inspections:","") + IF(Conditional_renewal__c = TRUE, "Conditional renewal:","") + IF(Conditional_application__c = TRUE, "Conditional application:","") + IF(Temporary_withdrawal__c = TRUE, "Temporary withdrawal:","") + IF(Permanent_withdrawal__c = TRUE, "Permanent withdrawal:","") + IF(Report_to_authorities__c = TRUE, "Report to authorities:","") + IF(Special_measures__c = TRUE, "Special measures:","")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Selected sanctions appear here in text format
CustomField.label: Selected Sanctions
